titleStmt.title: Good newes from Munster being an exact and true relation of certain passages of intelligence from the province of Munster in Ireland : as of taking of Ballincolly castle near Cork ... / faithfully collected (from the mouth of a gentlman [sic] of good rank and credit, Peter Courtup ...) by John Powell.
titleStmt.author: Powell, John.
Courtup, Peter.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
